name: Orc Tower
description:
Controls:

  •  Movement - WASD / Arrow Keys
  • Punch - Left-Click
  • Interact / Place Object - Right-Click
  • Scroll through Inventory - Scroll Wheel
  • Jump - Spacebar

The orc king's prized trophy, a magical  lich skull, has escaped and is floating high above the orc encampment!   You, the royal orc scientist must now devise a way to get it down.  The answer?  Steal miscellaneous objects from the humans and stack them to build a tower!
